list_definition.definition: money earned by a person who sells things for someone else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The realtor earns a 5% commission on the sale of each house.

list_definition.definition: an order for a work of art

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a commission to paint the president’s portrait.

list_definition.definition: an official paper giving authority, especially to an army officer etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My son got his commission last year.

list_definition.definition: an official group appointed to report on a specific matter
to give an order (especially for a work of art) to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was commissioned to paint the Lord Mayor’s portrait.

list_definition.definition: to give a military commission to.

list_ex_of_english: All articles, including commissioned ones, will be refereed.
